title: General Guy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Redeploy** (5x, day): Instantly reroll a target's role.
- **Tank Ride** (2x): Pick a player, the next time they would die, they will survive, on the second use, they only survive for the next day and night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn what your targets reroll into, if they are not a Koopa, the host should try to give them a worse role than before.
- You may self-target, and you may only reroll Koopa members thrice.
